name: People Can Fly
info:
• 别名: People Can Fly Sp. z o.o.
  • 别名: Epic Games Poland
  • 生日: 2002年2月
detail:
People Can Fly Sp. z o.o. and for a time known as Epic Games Poland, is a Polish video game developer established in February 2002 by Adrian Chmielarz and based in Warsaw, Poland. Their first video game was Painkiller.
On August 20, 2007, Epic Games acquired a majority share in the company. The firm was fully acquired in August 2012 by Epic, and subsequently rebranded itself as Epic Games Poland in November 2013. However, on June 24, 2015, it was announced they had become independent and they will revert to using their old name and logo.
